abstract: The filmmaker and television creator announced that he has finished shooting a low-budget adaptation of Shakespeare’s “Much Ado About Nothing” that was filmed in 12 days.
snippet: The filmmaker and television creator announced that he has finished shooting a low-budget adaptation of Shakespeare’s “Much Ado About Nothing” that was filmed in 12 days.

headline.main: A To-Do About a Surprise 'Much Ado' From Joss Whedon
